alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 26 at 12:48PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist, southeastern St. James, eastern Terrebonne, northwestern Lafourche and southeastern Assumption Parishes through 145 PM CST... At 1248 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Amelia to 25 miles southwest of Cocodrie. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Larose, Galliano, Cut Off, Lockport, Mathews, Schriever, Gray, South Vacherie, Chauvin, Dulac, Raceland, Chackbay, Montegut, Bayou Cane, Cocodrie, Labadieville, North Vacherie and Wallace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
